DOC.brief_summary: This is a multi-center, randomised and controlled study in subjects with acne vulgaris. The main objective of this study is to evaluate the effect of a supplementary patient education intervention (in addition to the standard-of-care patient education) on treatment adherence and satisfaction among acne patients receiving once-daily EpiduoTM gel treatment in primary care clinics.
DOC.brief_title: Patient Education in Adherence on Acne (PEAce)
DOC.criteria: 1. Male or female subjects age of 12 years or older, 2. With facial acne vulgaris that can be managed in primary care 1. Female subjects who are pregnant, nursing or planning a pregnancy during the study, 2. Subjects have a very severe variant of acne such as fulminating acne with systemic symptoms (acne fulminans)
